column1: 138kph, back of a length wide of off, he stands tall and opens the blade to guide it through gully to third man

caught at backward point! Some early shape forces a mistake! 144kph, full but it swung late away from the left hander, he only got half a stride in but lashed at a drive and sliced it off the outer half of the bat straight to Smith at backward point. Easy catch. Golden duck for Fakhar
138kph, beaten by a good length outswinger, he was caught on the crease and squared up as it zips past the edge
beaten again by 144kph fuller outswinger. Just missed the edge as he was half forward on the drive
crunched in the air straight at the umpire and he ducks out of the way! What a shot. Fuller on middle, 145kph, he thumps a drive hard and flat down the ground. No swing and it got met by Haris
good bouncer, accurate and quick, he ducks underneath
131kph, back of a length on off, he stands tall and defends with the full face
edged through the slips! Back of a length, he tried to punch off the back foot but got a thick edge that flew through where Finch was and races away!
on the hip and flicked away neatly with control to deep backward square
back of a length on middle, he tucks this off the pads to mid on

top edge straight up and Smith takes it at backward point! Crazy shot! It was back of a length, he tried a wild heave from the crease across the line on the front foot, got a top each that flew high to backward point and Smith camped under it and took his second simple catch
133kph, good length outside off, he pushes away from the body on the front foot to run it to third man
144.5kph, good length, fourth stump line, he pushes on the front foot to mid off
fuller length outside off, he drives on the up, not with fluent timing wide of mid off
143kph, back of a length wide of off, he tries to cut but misses
edged through a vacant second slip! 145kph rocket, good length angling across, gets the edge as he drives but there is only one slip in and he gets four more
142kph, shorter length outside off, he leans back and runs a late cut to third man
145kph, fuller on off, he pushes positively to mid off who is deep and immediately calls for one
89kph, shorter leg break on off, he's back and cutting to point
drifting into leg, he mistimes a sweep to short fine
flatter and fuller, drifting to middle, he pushes back to the bowler
skips down the track and hammers a drive straight of mid off! Great footwork to get down and drive inside out
even better over long off! He was down again to a wider ball, frees the arms and lofts it flat over long off
flatter on middle, he knocks it to midwicket which is vacant and calls two straight away, great placement and running
134kph, back of a length, he's back and punching off the back foot but gets a thick edge to third man
138kph, he drives on the up to mid on
136kph, back of a length on off, he defends towards backward point but can't steal one
137kph, angled into leg, he clips this neatly through square leg to the man in the deep
141kph, fuller into the pads, he clips this through midwicket forward of the sweeper and he gets a couple
138kph, good length, top of off, he defends with soft hands into the off side and pinches one
120kph, slower ball, Babar checks his cut shot, dragging it in the air but safely to wide mid off
120kph, slower ball short ball, he is deceived trying to pull but is through the shot too early
136kph, shorter length, he chops a cut shot to point but can't find the gap

bizarre shot! Shaped to step inside the line and lap it but it was a slower ball bouncer outside off that he had to duck! Rizwan wanted a wide call but he was outside the guideline when it went over his head
fuller on middle, he pushes to mid on and pinches a single
138kph, back of a length, punched square to backward point, Smith knocks it down but they run straight away to get there easily
94kph, darted into middle, he's pushing this toward long on and wants two but it's not there
looped up outside off, he drives easily to long off
slower at 85kph, he is forced to check the drive back to the bowler
drifting into leg, he skips out and whips this neatly to deep midwicket
shorter length, he's back and cutting past backward point, fine of the sweeper in the deep and they get two
he jumps out early, darted into leg, he clips this to square but can't pinch a second as McDermott races in from the deep
118kph, shorter slower off cutter, he pulls behind square into the gap for two
138kph, pace on, it climbs off a length, he jabs it off the gloves wide of the keeper fine of third man for two
shorter outside off, he pushes to point to pinch a single
118kph, short slower ball, he mistimes a pull behind square for a single
bouncer, 138kph, he leans back to try and uppercut but misses
this rears off a length it comes off the splice and Rizwan drops the bat, but Babar calls him through for a tight one, Rizwan has to stride out to get in without a bat in hand
skips down to a ball drifting in, he drags a drive hard down to long on
lofted just over Smith at long off! he didn't get all of it but he just got enough of it! Went inside out over long off, Smith was jumping on the rope but it just cleared him!
shorter length, punched hard to deep cover
tossed up, he mistimes a drive to cover
darted to off, he steps down on one knee and late dabs fine of short third man
fuller on middle, he pushes towards long on but Agar cuts it off
wrong un first up, he is back and chopping a pull down to long on
90kph, shorter ball on middle, he's back and pulling wide of long on for an easy two
looped up leg break, he pushes this to the gap at cover
shorter outside off, he is back punching back straight to point
tossed up, fuller outside off, he whips against the spin to long on
quicker leg break, he skips out but doesn't get to the pitch and knocks it away with his pad
arm ball from Agar, the batsman backs away and hacks it to the right of the bowler
pushed through on middle and leg, Babar drops down to one knee and pings a slog-sweep between deep square and deep midwicket. Pakistan find some respite
shorter and breaks away outside off, lashed to point

Holes out to long-on! Rizwan steps away and shuffles down the track. Agar is wary of it as he tosses it wide of off, asking the advancing batsman to fetch the ball from there. Rizwan has a swat at it but does not connect well enough, finding Cummins at the edge of the boundary. Rizwan has been put out of his misery. He just couldn't get going today
tip and run to cover as Babar turns the strike to new man Asif
wide of the crease, sliding in at off, inside-edged to midwicket
short of a length and slanting in nat 139ks, forced away to the left of Finch under the helmet at short leg
lifter on middle, tennis-ball bounce for Cummins, flies over the helmet as Asif can't meet with a pull
hip-high short ball of the slower variety, pulled away to long leg
shorter and outside off, Babar rides the bounce and pulls with the wrists to deep square
length and angling in at off, whipped to long-on
short, slow, 119ks, pulled with control through midwicket
dropped short and spins away outside off, there's the release for Babar. He jumps back and middles a cut to the right of backward point
wrong'un, faster and flatter, nurdled away to the leg side
Asif tees off! Say hello to Pakistan's finisher. Tossed on off, not much turn either way, Asif, standing on leg stump, has a heave-ho at it. Slog-swept hiiiiiigh and over the wide long-on boundary
pushed through outside off, tapped through the covers to follow the mighty six with a single
Babar uses his feet, Zampa skids one in and hits the pads of the moving batsman
looped up on leg stump, slog-swept away to deep square leg on the fence
short and holds its line outside off, lashed to sweeper cover off the back foot
lifter on middle, flies through to the keeper after beating Asif's hook
mid-off has just moved back and Asif finds that fielder with a swat off a slower variation
full on the stumps, shovelled away to deep square leg

123ks slower ball outside off, Asif hauls it away to Agar in the outfield. Asif clears his front leg and miscues it to deep midwicket. Agar runs in and completes a smart catch. The big hits aren't coming off for Pakistan

edged and Carey throws himself to his right, but can't touch the ball. On a length and wide outside off, Babar throws his hands at the ball and slashes it away from Carey's reach. The ball rolls away to the boundary and Babar marks his T20I captaincy debut with a fifty
nice and full, right in the slot to be put away. Starc overpitches it on leg stump, Imad backs away and lofts it straight into the lap of long-on, where Smith pouches it. Gone for a golden duck

full inswinger from wide of the crease, Babar has a bigger swing at it and misses. The sharp angle from Starc means it's heading down the leg side as Babar crosses over for a leg bye. Starc challenges the on-field not-out decision. It will stay as not out, missing leg comfortably enough
off-stump yorker, 142ks, jammed into the covers for one
banged in short and outside off, Babar jumps back, gets on top of the bounce and crunnnnnnches a pull in front of square for six
Starc hits a hard length on middle, does not come onto the bat, though. Babar is early into his shot and splices it over Starc's head
140ks yorker, tails in at middle, jabbed away to the leg side for one
137kph, waist high full toss! It shocks Warner as he bunts it down in surprise. Not called a no ball though. Umpire said it was under waist high
back of a length on off, he defends into the leg side and Finch calls Warner through
good length, hint of shape in, he pushes forward and punches to cover
another high full toss at 138kph wide of off, but it does drop under waist high as he misses on the drive
136kph, short and wide and he cuts neatly up and over point! Good shot. Using the pace and going up with the bounce
nearly a run out! Finch pushes a length ball towards mid off and called yes but then yelled 'no, no get back get back!'. Warner slipped slightly but his dive just beat the throw back
138kph, shorter length, he pulls from off stump behind square to the sweeper
cracking back foot drive! Superb from Finch. Just a length ball, fourth stump line, he hung back and punched it powerfully through cover-point. No need to run
124kph, good length, nipping away a touch, he's squared up as he defends to cover but they pinch a run
139kph, he charges and gets hit on the pad but it was sliding down, the balls runs to gully and they get a leg bye
138kph, back of a length on off, he's back and mistiming a punch back to the bowler
124kph, back of a length on off, he defends with soft hands to cover and they take an easy one
boom over square leg! 136kph, back of a length, he cleared the left leg and swung it high up and over square and into the crowd! Towering stroke
half-volley leg stump slower ball, 117kph, he clips this beautifully between midwicket and mid on. Lovely timing
over-steps and delivers a 122kph short wide throw down and Finch slaps it over cover-point with ease!
tees off over square leg again! Set his feet early, cleared the left leg, got a length ball in the slot and smashed it high over square leg into the crowd again!
138kph, half volley on off, he hangs back and miscues a punch to mid off

139kph, half volley, he's hanging back but slapped a drive straight of mid off, didn't time it perfectly but beat the man, Wahab has a long chase, he slides to save but as he went over the rope he touched the ball again before jumping back! Four runs
136kph, full on leg, he drives back to the bowler who misfields and they pinched one
back of a length wide of off, he opens the face and works it wide of third man for a couple
